title: IM DOWN 12 RP T_T
body: I was getting hipped up for project Ashe and project Katarina but im 12 RP short. please RIOT GIVE ME 12, ONLY 12

replies.body: We may be able to help with this!  Reach out to us by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or contacting player support on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport/).  Hopefully we can get this project activated for you!

Wait wait wait. What? I'm actually quite curious, did he get his 12 RP? I honestly wasn't expecting to see a reply like this. Is this something typically done in situations where people are off by a minute amount of RP (something below like, 15-20, or occasionally 15-20 but mostly 1-5, etc) or does something else contribute?

On a side note, if you do happen to respond, do you enjoy what you do on the forums? How long have you been a Red? Who's your favorite champion? :D

Sorry man i didn't get it

its been 2 days since i sent in the ticket

Rito didn't say anything after this.......... T_T
if you were asking me, then i would say Ashe

i just sent a ticket on the support page

please
